definition: trouble in carrying or managing caused by bulk or shape
details:
noun
- trouble in carrying or managing caused by bulk or shape
= synonyms: cumbersomeness, unwieldiness
- the inelegance of someone stiff and unrelaxed
= example: the inelegance of someone stiff and unrelaxed
= synonyms: stiffness
- the carriage of someone whose movements and posture are ungainly or inelegant
= synonyms: clumsiness
- the quality of an embarrassing situation
= example: the quality of an embarrassing situation
= synonyms: nuisance value
- unskillfulness resulting from a lack of training
= synonyms: ineptness, clumsiness, ineptitude, maladroitness
